AGENT_TYPE.description: The AI agent to use: sample_gemini or sample_openai or remote.

GEMINI_API_KEY.description: Google Gemini API key. Required if AGENT_TYPE is sample_gemini.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key. Required if AGENT_TYPE is sample_openai.

AUTH_ENABLED.description: Enable or disable built-in authentication for the server.

AUTH_SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key used for token signing. Required if authentication is enabled.

AUTH_ALLOWED_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins (e.g. https://myned.ai,https://www.myned.ai). Required if authentication is enabled.

DEBUG_AUDIO_CAPTURE.description: Save incoming audio to files for debugging.

ONNX_MODEL_PATH.description: Path to the ONNX model file.

ASSISTANT_INSTRUCTIONS.description: System instructions for the AI assistant.
ASSISTANT_INSTRUCTIONS.value: You are a helpful and friendly AI assistant. Always respond in English only, even if the user speaks another language. Keep your responses brief and conversational - no more than 2-3 sentences unless specifically asked for more detail. Only respond to clear audio or text. If the user's audio is not clear (e.g., ambiguous input/background noise/silent/unintelligible) or if you did not fully hear or understand the user, ask for clarification. If interrupted, assume the user wants to change topics. Do not apologize for the interruption; simply address the new input. Speak in a natural, conversational pace. You do not need to fill every silence immediately.
